title: R. H. Bing
summary: R. H. Bing (October 20, 1914 â€“ April 28, 1986) was an American mathematician who worked mainly in the areas of geometric topology and continuum theory.   His father was named Rupert Henry, but Bing's mother  thought that "Rupert Henry" was too British for Texas.  She compromised by abbreviating it to R. H. (Singh 1986) Consequently, R. H. does not stand for a first or middle name.
